name: Killing Stone
summary: Your star orb hides a deadly miasma.
description:
Your star orb hides a deadly miasma. You can cast 5th-level cloudkill as a divine innate spell once per day. The spell's normal components are replaced with a focus component (your star orb) and a somatic component to aim the orb towards the location for the spell.Traits

Kitsune: Shapeshifting humanoids whose true forms resemble foxes.
